mapper.select: SELECT product_id, buy_id, BUY_DATE, SUM(buy_count) FROM buy WHERE BUY_DATE LIKE '2019-07%' GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY SUM(buy_count) DESC;

SELECT p.product_id, p.product_category1, p.product_category2, b.buy_id, b.BUY_DATE, SUM(b.buy_count) FROM buy b, product p WHERE b.product_id= p.product_id AND b.BUY_DATE LIKE '2019-07%' GROUP BY p.product_category1 ORDER BY SUM(b.buy_count) DESC;
SELECT PRODUCT_ID, COUNT(PRODUCT_ID) FROM HEART GROUP BY PRODUCT_ID ORDER BY COUNT(PRODUCT_ID) DESC;
